product_description_battery_a: High-capacity battery pack for extended usage in all conditions.
product_description_battery_b: Compact and lightweight battery solution for portable devices.
contact_address: 123 Business Street, New York, NY 10001, USA
company_info_description: We are dedicated to delivering high-quality battery solutions that power innovation and mobility.
cookie_message: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience.
cookie_learn_more: Learn more about our cookie usage.
cookie_policy_necessary_description: Essential for the website to function properly.
cookie_policy_analytics_description: Help us improve our website by collecting anonymous data.
privacy_section_1_content: The protection of your personal data is very important to us. We therefore process your data exclusively on the basis of the statutory provisions (DSGVO, TKG 2003). In this data protection information we inform you about the most important aspects of data processing on our website.
privacy_section_2_content: If you contact us by email, the data you provide will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the request and in case of follow-up questions. This data will not be shared without your consent and will be treated confidentially. We review this data regularly and delete it if no further communication is required.
privacy_section_3_content: The web hosting provider collects data about every access to this website and saves it in so-called server log files. The data is automatically transmitted from the visitor’s web browser. The access data include: Name of the accessed website, file, date and time of access, amount of data transferred, notification of successful access, browser type and browser version as well as the operating system used by the visitor, referrer URL (the previously visited page), IP address and the requesting provider.The web hosting provider uses this access data for statistical evaluations for the purpose of operation, security and optimization of the offer.
privacy_section_4_content: Our website uses so-called cookies. These are small text files that are stored on your device with the help of the browser. They do no harm. We use cookies to make our offer user-friendly. Some cookies remain stored on your device until you delete them. They enable us to recognize your browser the next time you visit. If you do not want this, you can set up your browser so that it informs you about the setting of cookies and that you only allow this in individual cases. Deactivating cookies may restrict the functionality of our website.
privacy_section_4_content_case2: Cookies to control the bilingual website (German / English), will remove after clear browser cache, click below link or privacy policy version upgrade.
privacy_section_4_content_case3: Cookie to save the cookie consent via cookie banner, storage duration a year.
privacy_section_5_content: In principle, you have the right to information, correction, deletion, restriction, data portability, revocation and objection. If you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection law or your data protection claims have been violated in any other way, you can complain to the supervisory authority.
privacy_section_6_content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect changes to our practices or other reasons.
privacy_section_7_content: If you have any questions regarding data protection or this privacy policy, please contact us at: [Email address]
privacy_section_8_title: 8. Clear your cookies and local preferences
privacy_section_8_content: You can clear your cookies and local preferences by click the link.
data_clear_alert: The system has been upgraded. Please reconfigure your preferences (such as language and cookie settings).
application_battery_a: Portable devices, industrial equipment, and outdoor electronics.
compact_design: High energy density for compact design
fast_charging: Fast charging support (up to 80% in 30 mins)
long_cycle_life: Long cycle life and low self-discharge
safe_conditions: Safe and stable under extreme conditions
